name: De Dohg [GAME JAM]
description: De Dohg is  a game about playing as a dog named Dohg, who runs a farm and likes eating Bone Crops. But more importantly, it's a game about Feature-Creep, and about Chaos! While you start the game eating crops care-free, soon you need to keep an eye on Energy, Temperature, the Political Ideologies of your fellow dogs, time, and more! From breaking the law to sacrificing members of your tribe, you'll never know what comes next in De Dohg: A Game about Feature-Creep!
